title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 025
creator_credit: R.J. Edwards and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Magazine items: The Barossa Valley Vintage Festival in South Australia with a grand parade of floats depicting the heritage and achievements of the people; catamarans rate high in popularity among sailing enthusiasts; in Albany, Western Australia, Sir Robert Menzies unveils a memorial to the Desert Mounted Corps of World War 1.
creator_credit_for_label: R.J. Edwards and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
